languages.text: "Дом, которого я лишилась. Собратья, которых не смогла спасти. И элантах, чья предшественница всему виной. Страх и отчаяние овладели моей душой. Я должна была предпринять хоть что-то..."
"The home that I lost. The kin whom I could not save. And the elantach whose predecessor was to blame for it all. Fear and despair took hold of my soul. I had to do something, anything..."
languages.original_text: "Дом, которого я лишилась. Собратья, которых не смогла спасти. И элантах, чья предшественница всему виной. Страх и отчаяние овладели моей душой. Я должна была предпринять хоть что-то..."

traits.locale_text: "The home that I lost. The kin whom I could not save. And the elantach whose predecessor was at fault for it all. Fear and despair took hold of my soul. I had to do something, anything..."
"The home that I lost. The kin whom I could not save. And the elantach whose predecessor was at fault for it all. Fear and despair took hold of my soul. I had to do something, anything..."
"The home that I lost. The kin whom I could not save. And the elantach whose predecessor was to blame for it all. Fear and despair took hold of my soul. I had to do something, anything..."
"The home that I lost. The kin whom I could not save. And the elantach whose predecessor was to blame for it all. Fear and despair took hold of my soul. I had to do something, anything..."
"The home that I lost. The kin whom I could not save. And the elantach whose predecessor was to blame for it all. Fear and despair took hold of my soul. I had to do something, anything..."

languages.text: “我失去的家园，我无法解救的亲人，还有这一切的罪魁祸首，外界人的前任行商浪人。恐惧与绝望攫住了我的灵魂，我必须做些什么……什么都好……”
languages.original_text: "The home that I lost. The kin whom I could not save. And the elantach whose predecessor was to blame for it all. Fear and despair took hold of my soul. I had to do something, anything..."

traits.locale_text: “我失去的家园，我无法解救的亲人，还有这一切的罪魁祸首，外界人的前任行商浪人。恐惧与绝望攫住了我的灵魂，我必须做些什么……什么都好……”

languages.text: 「私が失った故郷。救えなかった同胞。そしてエランタ、全てはその祖先の責任だった。恐れと絶望が私の魂を捕らえた。私は何とかしなくてはならなかった。どのようなことであっても…」
languages.original_text: "The home that I lost. The kin whom I could not save. And the elantach whose predecessor was to blame for it all. Fear and despair took hold of my soul. I had to do something, anything..."

traits.locale_text: 「私が失った故郷。救えなかった同胞。そしてエランタ、全てはその祖先の責任だった。恐れと絶望が私の魂を捕らえた。私は何とかしなくてはならなかった。どのようなことであっても…」

languages.text: « Le foyer que j'ai perdu. Les proches que je n'ai pas su sauver. Et l'elantach dont la prédécesseure était responsable de tout. La peur et le désespoir se sont emparés de mon âme. Je devais faire quelque chose, n'importe quoi... »
languages.original_text: "The home that I lost. The kin whom I could not save. And the elantach whose predecessor was to blame for it all. Fear and despair took hold of my soul. I had to do something, anything..."

traits.locale_text: « Le foyer que j'ai perdu. Les proches que je n'ai pas su sauver. Et l'elantach dont la prédécesseure était responsable de tout. La peur et le désespoir se sont emparés de mon âme. Je devais faire quelque chose, n'importe quoi... »

languages.text: «El hogar que perdí, la gente que no pude salvar, y la elantach a cuy{mf|o|a} predecesor culparon de todo. El miedo y la desesperación se apoderaron de mi alma. Sentí que tenía que hacer algo, lo que sea...».
languages.original_text: "The home that I lost. The kin whom I could not save. And the elantach whose predecessor was to blame for it all. Fear and despair took hold of my soul. I had to do something, anything..."

traits.locale_text: «El hogar que perdí, la gente que no pude salvar, y la elantach a cuy{mf|o|a} predecesor culparon de todo. El miedo y la desesperación se apoderaron de mi alma. Sentí que tenía que hacer algo, lo que sea...».

languages.text: "Das Zuhause, das ich verloren habe. Meine Leute, die ich nicht retten konnte. Und {mf|der Elantach, dessen|die Elantach, deren} Vorgängerin die Schuld an allem trägt. Angst und Verzweiflung ergriffen von meiner Seele Besitz. Ich musste etwas unternehmen, irgendetwas ..."
languages.original_text: "The home that I lost. The kin whom I could not save. And the elantach whose predecessor was to blame for it all. Fear and despair took hold of my soul. I had to do something, anything..."

traits.locale_text: "Das Zuhause, das ich verloren habe. Meine Leute, die ich nicht retten konnte. Und {mf|der Elantach, dessen|die Elantach, deren} Vorgängerin die Schuld an allem trägt. Angst und Verzweiflung ergriffen von meiner Seele Besitz. Ich musste etwas unternehmen, irgendetwas ..."

languages.text: "Kaybettiğim yuvam, kurtaramadığım soydaşlarım ve hepsinin suçlusu selefi olan elantach. Korku ve dehşet, yüreğimi ele geçirmişti. Bir şeyler yapmak zorundaydım, ne olursa..."
languages.original_text: "The home that I lost. The kin whom I could not save. And the elantach whose predecessor was to blame for it all. Fear and despair took hold of my soul. I had to do something, anything..."

traits.locale_text: "Kaybettiğim yuvam, kurtaramadığım soydaşlarım ve hepsinin suçlusu selefi olan elantach. Korku ve dehşet yüreğimi ele geçirmişti. Bir şeyler yapmak zorundaydım, ne olursa..."
